name: Slinging Souls (across Styx)
description:
Slinging Souls (across Styx) was developed in 48h as part of the Minibeansjam 5. Enjoy!

If you are encountering issues with the browser version, try downloading the game at the bottom of the page.

Controls

  • use W / S or the arrow keys to aim your slingshot.
  • hold Space to charge up the shot. Let go to shoot!
  • that's it! Once you launched a soul, you get to relax.

Deep & Complex Lore

You are Charon, the mysterious and respected ferryman tasked with bringing the dead into Hades, the underworld. To do so, you take them aboard your trusty boat and ferry them across the endless river Styx. However, your boat has broken down due to your own fault the economy, and you need to come up with another idea to transport those poor souls to their afterlife... 

A Note about Bugs and missing Features

We are very much aware. :)

Credits

Dalton5000 - Art

Wagshadow - Design, Code
